services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: We offer a complete suite of services to help your business succeed online.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Cutting-edge web solutions tailored to your business needs.
items.longDescription: We build responsive, high-performance websites and web applications using the latest technologies. Our process focuses on scalability, security, and providing a seamless user experience. From e-commerce platforms to custom enterprise software, we deliver digital products that drive growth.

items.title: Branding & Design
items.description: Creating memorable brands that stand out from the crowd.
items.longDescription: Our branding and design services help you craft a unique identity that resonates with your target audience. We cover everything from logo design and brand guidelines to UI/UX design for digital products. We believe great design is about creating a lasting connection with your customers.

items.title: Digital Marketing
items.description: Data-driven marketing strategies to grow your audience.
items.longDescription: We help you reach and engage your target audience through comprehensive digital marketing strategies. Our services include SEO, content marketing, social media management, and paid advertising campaigns. We focus on measurable results and a positive return on investment.

portfolio.title: Our Achievements
portfolio.subtitle: A glimpse into some of our projects that demonstrate our expertise.

items.title: Taskly PME
items.description: Complete intervention management and scheduling tool for SMEs.
items.longDescription: Taskly SME is a SaaS solution designed to optimize the operations of small and medium-sized enterprises. It allows for intervention planning, real-time technician tracking, and detailed report generation.

items.title: Slate Peed'z
items.description: Pizza ordering platform with real-time tracking.
items.longDescription: A seamless online ordering experience for a local pizzeria. Integration of a secure payment system and an interactive map for delivery tracking.

items.title: Café Paris Lomé
items.description: Elegant website and digital menu for a prestigious restaurant.
items.longDescription: Creation of a showcase website highlighting the restaurant's ambiance and cuisine. Development of a QR code accessible menu with easy updates for staff.

items.title: Wings Shake
items.longDescription: A lightweight and fast web application for 'click and collect' ordering. Integration with Firebase for real-time order management by the restaurant.
